title: How do you move screens in Android 10 on a Pixel 3? Was this feature removed?!?!
content: I'm trying to rearrange my screens to my liking.  Before you can press on an empty space on a screen and you can rearrange the screens to you liking.  I will not be pleased if this feature was removed.  Customization is what differs Android from apple.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3 XL
